SummaryPlot

Source: R/SCP-plot.R
SummaryPlot.Rd

SummaryPlot

Usage

SummaryPlot(
  srt,
  group.by = NULL,
  group.split.by = NULL,
  features = NULL,
  reduction = NULL,
  Class_palette = "Paired",
  Exp_palette = "Spectral",
  size = 2,
  margin = 0.1,
  units = "in"
)

Arguments

srt

A Seurat object.

group.by

Name of one or more metadata columns to group (color) cells by (for example, orig.ident).

features

Name of one or more metadata columns to group (color) cells by (for example, orig.ident).

reduction

Which dimensionality reduction to use.

Class_palette

Name of palette to use for ClassDimPlot.

Exp_palette

Name of palette to use for ExpDimPlot.

size

Size of each plot.

margin

Margins around the plot when file is specified.

units

The units in which height, width and margin are given. Can be mm, cm, inches, etc. See unit.

Value

A grob obejct with size attributes.

Examples

data("pancreas_sub")
p <- SummaryPlot(pancreas_sub,
  group.by = c("CellType", "SubCellType"), group.split.by = "SubCellType",
  features = c("S_score", "G2M_score", "nFeature_RNA", "nCount_RNA")
)
p


## Save the plot with appropriate size
# ggplot2::ggsave(
#   filename = "summaryplot.png", plot = p,
#   units = attr(p, "size")$units, width = attr(p, "size")$width, height = attr(p, "size")$height
# )
